text: Brandon Samuel McPherson (born 2 February 2002) is an English professional footballer who plays as a Winger for Grimsby Town. ==Career== In 2018, McPherson joined Grimsby Town's academy from Walsall. On 3 September 2019, McPherson made his debut for Grimsby in a 2–1 EFL Trophy defeat against Scunthorpe United. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align: center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|FA Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |Grimsby Town |2019–20 |League Two |0||0||0||0||0||0||1||0||1||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0!!1!!0 |} ==References== Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Solihull Category:Association football wingers Category:English footballers Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players
